title.rendered: STEDI Micro V2 13.9 Inch 24 LED Flood Light (2700K)

content.rendered:
Micro V2 13.9 Inch 24 LED Flood Light (2700K)

MICRO SIZE, MACRO PERFORMANCE

We’ve taken our popular Micro LED Lights to the next level. Integrating a beautiful 2700k amber temperature, the Micro V2 24 LED is designed to punch above its own weight.

LOW PROFILE FITMENT

The Micro V2 24 LED provides a huge amount of application options. With the ability to fit into the tightest of spaces, you will be kept occupied with opportunities for enhancement.

KEY FEATURES

2700K Amber CCT
IP68 – Resistant to a maximum submersion depth of 1.5m for up to 30 minutes.
DT connector included.

Tech Specs

OPERATING VOLTAGE DC 10-28V
POWER CONSUMPTION 24W
AMP DRAW 2.7A@12V/1.35A@24V
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 2700K
LED 24 x OSRAM GW PSLR 32. PM DRUISS
EFFECTIVE LUMEN 2600lm
BEAM ANGLE Height: 30° Width: 120°
ENVIRONMENT TEMP -40° to 60°C
IP RATING IP68
LENS Polycarbonate with Surface Hardening
FRAME/HOUSING Extruded Aluminium
DT CONNECTOR Included
MOUNTING BRACKET 304# Stainless Steel
LIFETIME 30, 000hrs
SIZE (mm) 353 x 25 x 40.6
WEIGHT 0.5kg
CABLE LENGTH 400mm
CERTIFICATION CISPR25

 

What’s Included

  • 1 x 13.9 Inch Micro V2 24 LED Work Light (Amber)
  • 2 x 46mm Side Brackets
  • 2 x M8 Bolts
  • 2 x M6 Bolts
  • 2 x Nuts
  • 4 x Flat Washer
  • 4 x Spring Washer
  • Male & Female Deutsch Connectors

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI Micro V2 13.9 Inch 24 LED Flood Light (2700K)

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
